price: 17. Kuwa hanuunayna, (Alle) wuxuu u kordhiyaa hanuun, oo uu ku galladeystaa khayr uu waafajiyo iyo shar uu ka fogeeyo.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱهۡتَدَوۡاْ زَادَهُمۡ هُدٗى وَءَاتَىٰهُمۡ تَقۡوَىٰهُمۡ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna ih'tadaw zādahum hudan waātāhum taqwāhum
